author: Julius Charles Hare
message: Be what you are. This is the first step toward becoming better than you are.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buckminster Fuller
message: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: Love and compassion open our own inner life, reducing stress, distrust and loneliness.
title: Thought of the day

author: Walter Lippmann
message: Ideals are an imaginative understanding of that which is desirable in that which is possible.
title: Thought of the day
